text: cak bang khnnı hmu phu pen yiw nan phwk khea bidbeuxn brrda thxykha hı he xxk cak thi khxng man læa phwk khea klaw wa rea diyin kan læw læa rea kdi fafun kan læw læa than cng fang doythi michı pen phu diyin læa cng sdab fang rea doy bid lin khxng phwk khea læa sıray nı sasna læa hakwa phwk khea klaw wa rea diyin kan læw læa di cheuxfang kan læw læa than cng fang læa mxng du rea theid k ca pen sing di kwa kæ phwk khea læa theiyngtrng kwa tæthwa xallxhˌ di thrng la xnat phwk khea seiy læw neuxngdwy kar ptiseth sraththa khxng phwk khea dangnan phwk khea cung mi sraththa kan nxkcak pheiyng leknxy theanan
